snippet: For the past 15 years, Robin Lane has been scrawling a topical message in chalk on the same spot on a sidewalk in Manhattan as newsy provocations for his neighbors to discuss.
abstract: Character Study column on Robin Lane, day trader and performer who scrawls weekly provocations and inspirations in chalk on the sidewalk at Second Avenue and 33rd in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: For the past 15 years, Robin Lane has been scrawling a topical message in chalk on the same spot on a sidewalk in Manhattan as newsy provocations for his neighbors to discuss.

headline.print_headline: Talking to the City With Chalk
headline.seo: Robin Lane Gets the City Talking With Sidewalk Chalk
headline.main: Talking to the City With Chalk
